# RSPAN

## Phrases

### Retranscription

```{r}
rspan <- read.csv2("data/retran_rspan.csv", sep = ",")
rspan$subject_id <- as.factor(rspan$subject_id)
rspan$rt <- as.numeric(rspan$rt)
rspan[is.na(rspan)] <- 0
rspan$part <- factor(rspan$part, levels = c("sentence-pre", "sentence-post"))

rspan_scored <- read.csv2("data/retran_rspan_scored.csv", sep = ",")
rspan <- rspan %>%
  select(subject_id, part, time_elapsed, rt, set_number, size, correct, letters_recalled, correct_letters) %>%
  filter(part != "") %>%
  filter(part != "instruction") %>%
  filter(part != "Pause") %>%
  filter(part != "Beep Beep Beep") %>%
  filter(part != "Audio") %>%
  filter(part != "Retranscription") %>%
  filter(part != "letter-pre") %>%
  filter(part != "letter-post")

rspan_wm <- rspan %>%
  filter(part != "sentence-pre")%>%
  filter(part != "sentence-post")

rspan_sent <- rspan %>%
  filter(part != "recall-pre")%>%
  filter(part != "recall-post") %>%
  select(subject_id, part, rt, correct)
  
```

```{r}
rspan_sent %>%
  group_by(part) %>%
  get_summary_stats(correct)
```


```{r}
rspan_sent %>%
  group_by(part) %>%
  get_summary_stats(rt)
```

```{r}

ggdensity(rspan_sent, x = "rt", fill = "part", main = "Densité RT")

```

```{r}

ggqqplot(rspan_sent, x = "rt", facet.by = c("part"))

```

```{r}

ggdensity(rspan_sent, x = "correct", fill = "part", main = "Densité RT")

```
